Game.Name: Shin 4 Nin Uchi Mahjong - Yakuman Tengoku (Japan)
Game.plot: Shin 4-Jin Uchi Mahjong: Yakuman Tengoku is a Miscellaneous game, published by Nintendo,which was released in Japan in 1991.Cheat: Clear High ScoresDuring the tournament mode, at the map, view the "Top 4" players. There, hold Down, A, B, Select, and Start to reset those ratings.
